function $initHighlight(block, flags) { try { if (block.className.search(/\bno\-highlight\b/) != -1) return processBlock(block, true, 0x0F) + ' class=""'; } catch (e) { /* handle exception */ var e4x = <div>Example <p>1234</p></div>; } for (var i = 0 / 2; i < classes.length; i++) { // "0 / 2" should not be parsed as regexp if (checkCondition(classes[i]) === undefined) return /\d+/g; } }
